DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate influence progressive resistance training biceps shoulder rehabilitation patient subacromial impingement syndrome ( SIS ) . Method : randomize control clinical trial , analysis intention-to-treat , approve Ethics Research ( 1019/08 ) , contain sixty patient sex , SIS , evaluate initial time ( T0 ) , 45 day ( T45 ) 90 day treatment ( T90 ) . We analyze pain rest ( VAS ) , range shoulder movement , strength , function The Disabilities Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) quality life Short Form-36 ( SF-36 ) Western Ontario Rotator Cuff Index ( WORC ) . They recommend use NSAIDs analgesic presence pain exacerbate , every eight hour . Study group perform therapeutic exercise shoulder scapula stabilizer . In experimental group associate progressive resistance training biceps .
DOC.brief_title: Progressive Resistance Training Biceps Subacromial Impingement Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty patient Physical Therapy Clinic University Health Sciences Alagoas , sexes clinical diagnosis SIS , accord criterion Neer . Included diagnosis injury one rotator cuff tendon , pain three month , range 3 8 , base visual analogic scale ( VAS ) range 0 10 . Hawkins ' test Neer positive age 18 65 . The presence total rupture long head biceps , associate rheumatic shoulder surgery represent exclusion criterion . After approval IRB ( 1019/08 ) prepare sealed envelope , maintain secrecy allocation , patient divide control experimental group evaluate blind assessor , initial time ( T0 ) , 45 day treatment ( T45 ) 90 day treatment ( T90 ) . The shoulder assess degree active motion flexion , extension , medial lateral rotation abduction , patient stand position use manual goniometer . To determine movement flexion extension , upper limb position sagittal plane , goniometer along mid-axillary line trunk axle humeral head . The movable arm goniometer place body surface humerus toward lateral epicondyle . Abduction fix arm goniometer position posterior axillary line trunk , align blade move arm place posterior surface arm along longitudinal axis humerus . The medial lateral rotation accomplish position shoulder abduction 90 degree , axle goniometer position olecranon movable arm along axis forearm . The strength manual pressure assess use hydraulic dynamometer , manufacture Korea . The instrument graduate two scale - kilogram force ( Maximum 90 pound ) , form-fitting catcher five adjustment position accommodate size hand evaluation . During strength assessment , upper limb position rest beside body elbow flexed 90 degree , forearm wrist neutral position . Pain assessment conduct rest , use VAS range 0 ( pain ) 10 cm ( intolerable pain ) . The Disabilities The Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) questionnaire use evaluation impairment physical symptom upper limb . It consist 30 mandatory item relate function symptom ( DASH 1 ) two optional area , divide four issue work activity ( DASH 2 ) 4 question activity daily live ( DASH 3 ) . The Western Ontario Rotator Cuff Index ( WORC ) Short- form health survey ( SF-36 ) tool use evaluate quality life . The WORC specific patient suffer rotator cuff injury five domain : physical symptom ( SF ) , sport recreation ( ER ) , work ( T ) , state vitality ( EV ) emotion ( E ) . The WORC score set calculation general analysis independent domain . The treatment plan hold 3 month , twice week throughout sample , practice therapeutic exercise shoulder scapula stabilizer use bat without charge , train isometric exercise commute cuff muscle , without subacromial generate impaction . In experimental group , associate progressive resistance training biceps . The progression resistance training biceps , base calculation maximum resistance ( MR ) , conduct three set 10 repetition 50 % MRI first series train 75 % MRI second series , 2 minute , . In presence pain great equal seven , base VAS , patient instruct use paracetamol 750mg every six hour diclofenac sodium 50mg every eight hour .
